pullRequest.title: Add Checkstyle and improved API docs
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit adds Checkstyle rules for EssentialsX, based on those from the adventure library (https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/tree/master/.checkstyle).
To do:

 Fix up violations
 Make Checkstyle passes mandatory
 Add credit to adventure to checkstyle config

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<!DOCTYPE suppressions PUBLIC "-//Checkstyle//DTD SuppressionFilter Configuration 1.2//EN" "http://checkstyle.org/dtds/suppressions_1_2.dtd">
+<suppressions>
+    <suppress files=".*[\\/]test[\\/]java[\\/].*" checks="RequireExplicitVisibilityModifier"/>
+</suppressions>

beforeCommit.message:
Begin adding Checkstyle rules

This commit adds Checkstyle rules for EssentialsX, based on those from the adventure library (https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/tree/master/.checkstyle).

To do:
- [ ] Consider RequireThis validateOnlyOverlapping=false
- [ ] Fix up violations
- [ ] Add auto-formatter rules for easy importing into IDEs

commit.message:
Add Checkstyle rules and suppressions

This commit adds Checkstyle rules for EssentialsX, based on those from the adventure library (https://github.com/KyoriPowered/adventure/tree/master/.checkstyle).

It also makes Checkstyle passes mandatory for a GH build to pass.
Add Javadocs to most API classes

afterCommit.message: Add Javadocs to most API classes
